title: Pls unban account - reformed
body: i is sorry for the bad chat behaviors - pls unban has reformed- won't happens again - Urapirate

replies.body: What of your previous punishments? They are designed to function as strong warnings.
I believe at the time i ignored and laughed them off :) Account got banned several months ago though, wasn't actually toxic too was just putting inappropriate messages in chat

Well you shouldn't have ignored them. Those punishments are Riot and the community saying to you "Hey, we aren't going to accept this sort of behaviour". It is explicitly stated in the reform card you receive upon being issued a 14 day ban that "If this behaviour continues, your account will be permanently suspended".

You have demonstrated no desire to reform until the consequences were permanent. You used up all your chances to agree to the terms of being a part of the community, if not actually agree with them and reform and you didn't do so. So in your mind, what makes you deserving of another chance now?
I don't deserve another chance to be honest {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
